message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm really interested in the product, but $9500 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Is there any flexibility on your end?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $9500 might be a stretch, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $8200, which is the lowest I can go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $8200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $7500, but I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in between. Can you do $7800?

I understand that you're trying to find a middle ground, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I can do $8100, which is the closest I can get to your target price. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
